title: Nicky Whelan debuts new relationship with Canadian actor Kyle Schmid
text:
She separated from her husband, retired NFL star Kerry Rhodes, in 2017 after just six months of marriage.

And on Tuesday, Nicky Whelan proudly debuted her new relationship with 35-year-old Canadian actor Kyle Schmid.

The couple held hands while strolling through Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport in Puerto Rico.

High-flying romance! Former Neighbours star Nicky Whelan debuted her new relationship with Canadian actor Kyle Schmid in Puerto Rico on Tuesday

The former Neighbours star, 38, dressed casually for her flight in a pair of overalls and a black singlet.

She added height to her petite frame by wearing nude heeled boots, and accessorised with aviator sunglasses.

Nicky also showcased her natural beauty by going makeup free, and styled her short blonde hair up and away from her face.

They're not hiding it! The pair appeared in high spirits as they walked through the terminal, smiling and laughing as they spoke to paparazzi

The pair appeared in high spirits as they walked through the terminal, smiling and laughing as they spoke to paparazzi.

Kyle is an actor best known for his role in Netflix series The I-Land, which also stars Kate Bosworth and Alex Pettyfer.

Last year, Nicky said she was forced to 'start her life again' following her split from Kerry in 2017 after six months of marriage.

Casual: The former Neighbours star, 38, dressed casually for her flight in a pair of overalls and a black singlet

'I thought that I had lost everything - but in fact I had gained more love for myself than ever before,' she wrote on Instagram at the time.

'This time last year I walked away from my entire life with Yoda [her dog] under my arm. I started my life again at 36.

'I have lost friends - but made hundreds of new ones. I have cried on my knees - but also laughed harder than I ever have in my life.'

Moving on: Last year, Nicky said she was forced to 'start her life again' following her split from Kerry Rhodes (right) in 2017 after six months of marriage. Pictured on January 28, 2017

Nicky announced her split from the American sports star in October 2017.

'I can confirm that I have left him,' Nicky said. 'But other than that I am not willing to comment any further, because anything else I say is going to make things tricky.'

The former couple met while filming a comedy sketch in Los Angeles in 2015 and became engaged the following year.
